Job Title: National Product Sales Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
National Product Manager 

What We Need

Corpay is currently looking to hire a/a National Product Sales Manager within our division. This position falls under our insurance line of business and is located in St, Charles, IL. In this role, you will report directly to Vice President of Sales and regularly collaborate with Product and the IT team.

How We Work

As a National Product Sales Manager, you will be expected to work in virtual environment. Corpay will set you up for success by providing:

 Laptop/I pad.  Training on site and virtually  Phone and internet stipend. 

Role Responsibilities

As part of your role, you will need to connect product development, sales strategies, and marketing initiatives to work closely with the Vice President of Sales and Product team to deliver technology solutions to our customers that meet their unique needs. You will collaborate with the sales team providing training on both current and upcoming products during customer-facing meetings and training sessions for adjusters and carriers. You will also travel to on-site meetings, conferences, and other industry events to provide product training and take part in product discussions and support the overall growth of the business.

You will partner with the Director of Product and VP of Sales to identify emerging trends, develop proactive resources, and communicate with customers. In this role, you will own our messaging and storytelling to carriers/adjusters, crafting clear and memorable messaging. Success in this role will result in deepening relationships with our adjusters and carrier partners.

Your work will involve developing go-to-market strategies and driving launches for our growing product lines in collaboration with the Director of Product, Vice President of Sales, and Vice President of Engineering. You will also evaluate the performance of our products and develop strategies to drive further adoption and customer engagement. Finally, you will turn your knowledge into creative content ideas to reach, engage, and educate our key audiences.

Qualifications & Skills

 5 years sales experience in P&C 

Benefits & Perks 

 Medical, Dental & Vision benefits available the 1st month after hire  Automatic enrollment into our 401k plan (subject to eligibility requirements  Virtual fitness classes offered company-wide  Robust PTO offerings including: major holidays, vacation, sick, personal, & volunteer time  Employee discounts with major providers (i.e. wireless, gym, car rental, etc.  Philanthropic support with both local and national organizations  Fun culture with company-wide contests and prizes 
 Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer 

Corpay is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Corpay provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, gender (including pregnancy), religion, national origin, ancestry, disability, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, language, ancestry, genetic information, veteran and/or military status or any other group status protected by federal or local law. If you require reasonable accommodation for the application and/or interview process, please notify a representative of the Human Resources Department.

For more information about our commitment to equal employment opportunity and pay transparency, please click the following links: EEO and Pay Transparency .

Apply Now

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
